casebody.data:
THE UNITED STATES, PETITIONER, v. ALBERT & HARRISON, INCORPORATED, A CORPORATION [No. 46125] [107 C. Cls. 292;

331 U. S. —]

Government contract; misleading drawings; recovery for extra work. Judgment for plaintiff.

Defendant’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court April 28, 1947.
